item.title: Use The Power Of Your Subconscious Mind To Manifest!
item.description:
Use The Power Of Your Subconscious Mind To Manifest!

by Andrea Schulman, Guest writer, BodyMindSoulSpirit.com Do you know what your consciousness is? Your consciousness is simply your thoughts and awareness. As a conscious being, you are capable of observing and having thought, and as we've discussed many times in this blog, your thoughts and awareness are responsible for creating your reality with the Law of Attraction.

item.title: How To Gain Total Clarity on What You Want
item.description:
How To Gain Total Clarity on What You Want

The first step to getting started with Creative Visualization is being crystal clear on WHAT you want. In this video, you'll be guided into a series of 'thought exercises' to bring your the clarity you need. This is an important step to help you know what to visualize, so you can get the most results with your Creative Visualization practice.
